name: auto-image

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test -w ai-admin-vue && npm run test -w ai-backend-nest
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:node_modules: rimraf node_modules && cd ai-admin-vue && rimraf node_modules && cd ../ai-backend-nest && rimraf node_modules
scripts.clean:build: rimraf dist && cd ai-admin-vue && rimraf dist && cd ../ai-backend-nest && rimraf dist
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && echo '构建完成，准备部署...'
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && echo '构建完成，准备部署到生产环境...'

author: Your Name
description: 全栈AI图片处理平台 - 包含Vue前端和NestJS后端
